permissions: No authentication required; a valid SAML login code that maps to an existing XBE user is required to receive an auth token.
side_effects: Exchanges the SAML login code with the SSO provider to fetch a profile and returns an auth token for the matched user.
validation_notes: The code attribute is required; server strips whitespace and validates presence. Redemption fails with a validation error if the SSO exchange does not yield an auth token (e.g., code invalid, unauthorized, or no matching user). The auth_token attribute is read-only.

flags.name: --code
flags.validation: Required; whitespace is stripped server-side; example: saml_code_value.
